Recaria (Recarian: Rekari-baje), officially the Recarian Republic (Recarian: Rekari-badimaranresjje), is a country in (-continentname-). Located at the southeastern tip of (-continentname-), it covers the area of 1,377,685 square kilometers. Recaria is bordered by Bangsalaya to the north, and Vyasastan to the west.
